name: Textualizer
tagline: A jQuery plug-in which transitions through blurbs of text, animating each character
body: Textualizer is a jQuery plug-in that allows you to transition through blurbs of text. When transitioning to a new blurb, any character that is common to the next blurb is kept on the screen, and moved to its new position.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
